extension.dc:title: Simple Images
extension.name: Image
extension.dc:subject: dwc:Taxon dwc:Occurrence
extension.dc:description: Simple extension for exchanging metadata, in particular links, for species or occurrence images

property.name: identifier
property.dc:description: The public URL that identifies and locates the image file directly, not a html page.

property.name: references
property.dc:description: A html webpage that shows the image or its metadata. This link should be used for html based image viewers like FSI and should be used as a source link wherever the image is shown.

property.name: description
property.dc:description: A longer description for this image
property.examples: Female Tachycineta albiventer photographed in the Amazon, Brazil, in November 2010.

property.name: spatial
property.dc:description: The locality this picture was taken at

property.name: subject
property.dc:description: A list of keywords describing this image
property.examples: Cromwell Mountains, Amarillydaceae, Narcissus, hispanicus, yellow flower

property.name: latitude
property.dc:description: The WGS84 latitude in decimal degrees of the location the image was taken. A decimal number ranging from -90 through 90. Decimal fractions of a degree should be expressed to the precision available. Latitudes north of the equator MAY be specified by a plus sign (+), or by the absence of a minus sign (-). Latitudes south of the Equator MUST be designated by a minus sign (-) preceding the digits designating degrees.

property.name: longitude
property.dc:description: The WGS84 longitude in decimal degrees of the location the image was taken. A decimal number ranging from -180 through 180. Decimal fractions of a degree should be expressed to the precision available. Longitudes east of the prime meridian shall be specified by a plus sign (+), or by the absence of a minus sign (-). Longitudes west of the prime meridian MUST be designated by a minus sign (-) preceding the digits designating degrees.

property.name: format
property.dc:description: The format the image is exposed in

property.name: created
property.dc:description: The date and time this image was taken

property.name: creator
property.dc:description: The person that took the image

property.name: contributor
property.dc:description: Any contributor in addition to the creator that helped in taking the image

property.name: publisher
property.dc:description: An entity responsible for making the image available.

property.name: audience
property.dc:description: A class or description for whom the image is intended or useful

property.name: license
property.dc:description: License for this image. Can be text or a url like creative commons uses

property.name: rightsHolder
property.dc:description: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the image.

property.name: modified
property.dc:description: The date and time this image was written or last modified

property.name: accessRights
property.dc:description: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status.

property.name: rights
property.dc:description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.
